HERO_TITLE: Secure connection with patients and airlines
HERO_SUBTITLE_1: Get your Covid-PCR Exams and Test results securely connected to your customers using Blockchain technology.
HERO_SUBTITLE_2: Digital authentication can help you the risk of counterfeiting over paper and ePaper results.
DESCRIPTION_TITLE: Travel Certificates: A new market requirement
DESCRIPTION_SUBTITLE: The post-pandemic world requires more effective health and immunisation controls. Immunie provides a safe and cost-effective solution for that.
FEATURES_ITEM_1_SUBTITLE: Send individual messages to each of your customers via email, SMS or PUSH with reminders and results information.
FEATURES_ITEM_2_SUBTITLE: Data authentication with strong encryption, global standard servers and the security of a GDPR Compliant Blockchain technology solution.
FEATURES_ITEM_3_SUBTITLE: 100% digital, safer and contactless processes add value to your business and expand your customer base.
FEATURES_ITEM_4_SUBTITLE: Immunie was developed to integrate different networks, applications and platforms via API.
VIDEO_SECTION_SUBTITLE: An integrated network  connecting your exam lab to your customers, schools, airlines and managers of major events, 100% online, with the security of Blockchain technology.
VIDEO_SECTION_OUR_SPONSORS: We work with the best available technology providers and partners
ABOUT_ITEM_1_SUBTITLE: Exam results integrated with eTicket via App or API.
ABOUT_ITEM_1_DESCRIPTION: Be part of a network that allows data generated by your laboratory to be delivered in real time to the user, airlines or major events.
ABOUT_ITEM_2_DESCRIPTION: Data authenticated by Blockchain technology prevents the possibility of tampering with a paper certificate or PDFs.
ADVANTAGES_SUBTITLE: Immunie technology expands the reach of your business.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_1_DESCRIPTION: Results shared by the customer for generating direct eTicket via App or API.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_2_TITLE: Let your customers share its results with schools when needed.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_2_DESCRIPTION: Become a service provider integrated with a network of students and schools.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_3_DESCRIPTION: Always remember your logo on your client's digital vaccination card.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_4_DESCRIPTION: Offer a differentiated service with the integration of results into the electronic ticketing system via API.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_5_DESCRIPTION: Convenience for your customers to participate in business or academic events safely, without queues.
ADVANTAGES_ITEM_6_DESCRIPTION: Issue vaccination certificates in 12 languages ​​with automatic translation, without complications.
PRIVACY_SUBTITLE: Built to meet the most advanced global data privacy requirements.
PRIVACY_ITEM_1_AUTHOR_FEEDBACK: Designed and implemented to exceed the UK data privacy requirements.
PRIVACY_ITEM_2_AUTHOR_FEEDBACK: Meets all requirements of the European Data Protection Regulation (EU GDPR).
PRIVACY_ITEM_3_AUTHOR_FEEDBACK: Implemented in accordance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).
